channel.title: How do I add this to my server?
channel.description:
Hi, how do I add a thing where when you log in for ths first time, it says:
you must type ::rules before you can start playing.
How do I add that to my server? and make it so you can't move until you type it. and also it won't do it after you have logged on again.?
Many Thanks
Musicmad441[br][size=1]Posted on: 16-09-2007, 15:54:20[/size][hr]I still can't work it out

Musicmad. Yes it does work ffs… YOU NEED TO EDIT IT-.-

item.title: How do I add this to my server?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Uhhhmm, it does work because ive tested it?.. It does work with EntangleDelay… You could also make a new EntangleDelay, because the problem i get is, it says “A Magical force stops you from moving”… So if you make a new one, it will work

item.title: How do I add this to my server?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

doggiedoo86:

Check a server that has it… I don’t now they have it.

Really, IMO i think you have alot more knowledge than ripping out of other peoples servers. Please… Dont rip…

–

musicmad441:

show me how do add please.

Its simple!.. In your login, or your welcome, add

Rule1();
Rule2();
                sendMessage("You must type ::rules before moving.");

Then add an int

public int RulesTyped = 0;

Then, add your rules command

if (command.startsWith("rules")) {
Rule1();
} else {
Rule2();
}

Then to make your method…

public void Rule1() {
if (RulesTyped == 1);
sendMessage("Thanks, you can now move!");
}

Now for your second method.

public void Rule2() {
if (RulesTyped == 0);
EntangleDelay = 9999;
sendMessage("Type ::rules before moving!");
}

Thats not 100% perfect. It kinda works though… Just a problem in it, work on it, you’ll get it right

Read full topic
